punktiert.physics
Class BAttraction

java.lang.Object
  punktiert.math.Vec
      punktiert.physics.VParticle
          punktiert.physics.BAttraction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, BehaviorInterface
public class BAttraction
extends VParticle
implements BehaviorInterface

basic Attractor class, based on toxi.physics.behaviors.AttractionBehavior by Karsten Schmidt

applies a force based on distance to the passed in VParticle

add this behavior to the VPhysics instance
